description:
WHATS NEW(v1.4.0): 1. Paid bills can be set to be inserted into checkbook 2. Auto generation of check numbers can be customized 3. You can email pin to yourself for safekeeping.
*** OVERVIEW: Dough (full version) is an  integrated solution for managing your personal finance on the Palm Pre and Pixi. With Dough you can manage unlimited accounts, set a budget, see your spending on visual graphs, track your spending trends, manage recurring transactions with calendar reminders, manage bills with calendar reminders and much more. *** LITE VERSION: The Lite version gives you a chance to try the product before buying it. The Lite version works exactly like the full version except for restrictions. You are restricted to two accounts with five transactions. You can create two recurring transactions. Related to bills you can create five bills and two recurring bills. WARNING: Lite versions are not backward compatible. Do not update a previous version of Dough Lite with this version. SUPPORT: Send any questions you might have to dough@codebeyond.mobi.
